description: This file defines the MatchesScreen widget for a Flutter app, which displays a list of profile matches with filtering options, including filter chips, grid display of profiles, and navigation to a filter configuration screen.

classes.name: MatchesScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a list of profile matches with filtering and navigation controls.

classes.name: _ActiveFilterChips
classes.description: A widget that displays active filter criteria as removable chips with options to reset or clear filters.

classes.name: _DeletableChip
classes.description: A custom widget representing a filter criterion as a chip with delete functionality.

methods.name: _enumLabel
methods.description: Converts enum names with camelCase or snake_case to a human-readable label, e.g., middleEastern -> Middle Eastern.

methods.name: _buildOrderedChips
methods.description: Builds a list of filter chips based on current filter criteria, sorted and formatted for display.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MatchesScreen, constructing the entire UI including app bar, filter chips, profile grid, and navigation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for _ActiveFilterChips, which arranges filter indication chips and an optional 'Clear All' button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for _DeletableChip, representing individual filter tags with delete actions.
